comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.secondaryMagicDescription: An Application of Light magic that allows the user to create barriers and purify objects.
An Application of Dark magic that allows the user to manipulate blood, controlling its flow and properties.
An Application of Dark magic that allows the user to raise the dead and control undead creatures.
An Application of Nature magic that allows the user to heal wounds and cure ailments.
An Application of Water magic that allows the user to freeze objects and create ice structures.
An Application of Dimensional magic that allows the user to manipulate gravitational forces, affecting weight and movement.
An Application of Dimensional magic that allows the user to instantly travel from one location to another.
